name: Loot of Enlightenment
description:
[Game Jam Project]

Production Time: 2days

Team:
Roxy Dürrmann, Nick Wang, Daniel Majonica, Karina Klein, Emese-Anna Hoppa

In the game you can pick one of three angels and beat you highest score by surviving against the hoards of demons trying to invade Heaven.

>>Music and Sounds are from freesounds.org<<
